Hardest problem: understanding Hugo structures / getting a theme I'm happy with. Easiest problems: Netlify, emoji, gifs, actually writing posts (ty [blogdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/)). A list of things I found useful when making this blog. 

- Alison Presmanes Hill
 [\@apreshill](https://twitter.com/apreshill): blogdown + [these slides](https://alison.rbind.io/slides/blogdown-workshop-slides.html#63) (esp. enable emoji in config.toml!); 
- Amber Thomas [\@ProQuesAsker](https://twitter.com/ProQuesAsker): syntax [highlighting](http://amber.rbind.io/blog/2017/11/15/syntax-highlighting/)! (And general setting up a theme and getting it to work)
- Colin Fay [\@_colinfay](https://twitter.com/_colinfay):   using [rvest](http://colinfay.me/purrr-web-mining/)) and functions and general purrr-y things
- Mara Averick [\@dataandme](https://twitter.com/dataandme): general + links to all the other ppl.
- Muan [\@muanchiou](https://twitter.com/muanchiou): emoji [Emoji searcher](http://emoji.muan.co/) `r emo::ji('heart_eyes')`
- Richard Lent [\@lentrichard](https://twitter.com/lentrichard): more [image problems](https://richardlent.github.io/post/getting-images-to-work/)
- Yihui Xie [\@xieyihui](https://twitter.com/xieyihui): blogdown specs + opinions + answers in Github issues [including images/gifs](https://github.com/rstudio/blogdown/issues/45)
